title: What is the difference between text messages in an Android OS and those in a traditional OS? What is the advantage of text messages in the Android OS?
answer:
Difference
>In a traditional operating system (OS), text messages are stored in your inbox and sent box. In an Android OS, text messages to or from a contact are stored in a thread. Only one draft can be saved for each thread. 
>Advantage Messaging in an Android OS is similar to instant messaging services such as MSN, which helps you to follow the conversation more easily.
